thread.title: Boom Williams receives NFL Combine invite
thread.title_full: Boom Williams receives NFL Combine invite

title: Boom Williams receives NFL Combine invite
text:
Boom Williams receives NFL Combine invite Kentucky running back Boom Williams is headed to the NFL Combine. Slot to Kentucky Links (Photo: Rob Foldy, Getty) 
Kentucky junior running back Boom Williams has received an invitation to attend the NFL Combine, he announced on Twitter Tuesday. 
Combine invite came through üôèüèæ #Blessings ‚Äî Boom Williams (@boom_that_guy) January 31, 2017 
Get the latest UK news sent straight to your inbox with out EMAIL NEWSLETTER 
Williams, who declared for the NFL Draft following the Wildcats' 33-18 loss to Georgia Tech in the TaxSlayer Bowl, has already signed with SportsTrust Advisors, a sports management firm based out of Atlanta. 
He finished the 2016 season with 1,170 rushing yards, the fifth-highest single season total in school history and the most since Artose Pinner in 2002. Williams ended his college career seventh all-time on the UK career rushing list with 2,511 yards. 
The NFL Combine will take place Feb. 28 - Mar. 6 in Indianapolis, where coaches and front office personnel from all 32 NFL teams will be on hand to evaluate over 300 of the nation‚Äôs top college football players eligible for the upcoming NFL Draft.
